    static CurvePoint odrSpiral​(double s, double cDot)

  • Method Details

    • odrSpiral

      public static CurvePoint odrSpiral​(double s, double cDot)
      compute the actual "standard" spiral, starting with curvature 0
      Parameters:
      s - run-length along spiral
      cDot - first derivative of curvature [1/m2]
      x - resulting x-coordinate in spirals local co-ordinate system [m]
      z - resulting z-coordinate in spirals local co-ordinate system [m]
      t - tangent direction at s [rad]
